channel.title: Time to Move On on David McClellan
channel.description: Recent content in Time to Move On on David McClellan

item.title: Time for a Change
item.description:
Where I Am?

I’m still in Bristol, still learning, and clearly not still blogging. Work has really taken over a lot of my life right now, so finding time to blog in my spare time has taken a backseat to spending time with my wife and kids. I’ve also tried to limit my time with technology outside of work, as I’m quite burned out from tech in general.

I still find joy in writing and using technology, just not all the time anymore. I’ve moved on to other hobbies.
